## wavBytes variable

Similar to [wavByteArray](./dsp-io-wav.wavbytearray.md)<!-- -->, but yields an iterator of the result bytes, not an actual byte array.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
wavBytes: (spec: WavSpec, src: Iterable<number>) => IterableIterator<number>
```
